title: Pappa al pomodoro with squid, octopus and prawns
description: A labour of love for two, the classic Tuscan bread-and-tomato soup gets an upgrade with pan-fried seafood and zesty basil oil.
ingredients: 6 raw king prawns, ideally Sicilian red
2 x 400g jars skinned Italian tomatoes in water, drained (or use tinned tomatoes)
handful baby plum tomatoes, skinned and roughly chopped
5 slices stale sourdough, cut into chunks
1 unwaxed lemon, finely grated zest and juice
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
2 slices flatbread, ideally Sardinian pane carasau, toasted
